member.name: T:FarPoint.PDF.Drawing.Graphics
member.summary: Represents the graphics device drawing functions.
member.remarks: This class performs all the drawing functions on a PDF Page object. It maintains the PDF grpahic state using structures GraphicState and GraphicsStateStack. Always remember to update the graphic state structures in case the PDF graphics state changes.
